channel.title: [PI] Item on Item
channel.description: How do I make when I use item 1 on item 2 and get item 3? And how do I add you need 96 herblore to do so?

item.title: [PI] Item on Item
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

[quote=“QuakeTavlonia, post:3, topic:399289”][quote author=Cres link=topic=496426.msg3629164#msg3629164 date=1308074707]

How do I make when I use item 1 on item 2 and get item 3? And how do I add you need 96 herblore to do so?

UseItem.java , the rest is common sense.
[/quote]
Dude, people are trying to learn to do java coding, saying that is no help for alot of people. -.-[/quote]
he doesnt need to be a java master in order to do this, and lots of people here don’t give a flying shiz about java, they just want a good rsps

anyways just search for pi making a dfs and it is the same thing.

Read full topic
